channel.title: GodSword Animation Problem
channel.description:
[b]I did SilentCJ'S 100% godsword anim tutorial and this is what it showed and I kept trying to fix it/change it but it would show the same thing.. [/b] [URL=http://s884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/?action=view&current=clip0078.flv][IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/th_clip0078.jpg[/img][/URL]
[u][b]If you do not want to watch the video, it justs shows basically me holding a godsword and doing different kinds of emote (bow, clap, goblin dance, head bang, ect) What should I do to fix this?[/b][/u]

item.title: GodSword Animation Problem
item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

Get a new animation file, ints and re-add it all. That should fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: GodSword Animation Problem
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

I did SilentCJ’S 100% godsword anim tutorial and this is what it showed and I kept trying to fix it/change it but it would show the same thing…

If you do not want to watch the video, it justs shows basically me holding a godsword and doing different kinds of emote (bow, clap, goblin dance, head bang, ect)
What should I do to fix this?

Read full topic
